name: ClaimSorted
headline: Making it easy for insurance companies to process claims
description: ClaimSorted helps insurance companies remove the hassle of managing claims by enabling them to outsource their claim operations to us. This service is known as a Third Party Administrator (TPA). Unlike traditional TPAs, we blend AI and best-in-class experts to deliver a 5-star customer experience, minimise mistakes and speed up claim assessment.

founders.name: Pavel Gertsberg, Founder
founders.description: Before starting ClaimSorted, Pavel built a pet insurance company, Fluffy, which he scaled to over 20,000 customers working with some of the largest insurers. Before starting his insurance company, Pavel worked as a Head of Growth building marketing, sales and product functions in SaaS and InsurTech companies.

founders.name: German Mikulski, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO at ClaimSorted. Previously founded Fluffy, a pet insurance company, automating ~70% of back-office processes with AI. Formerly at Deutsche Bank, where he developed systems processing over $100 million in transactions

# **Modern claims TPA for modern insurance companies**
ClaimSorted is a digital claims TPA providing a 5-star claims experience to policyholders while also reducing operational and indemnity costs for insurance companies through our industry-leading claims team and advanced automation
[Request a demo](https://claimsorted.com/</request-a-demo>)
![ycombinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110274a_ycombinator.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/66eb26eb907d3d9820d731b4_anthropic.png)
![microsoft](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102745_microsoft.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/66eb2702273f2488f5bea660_aws.png)
![open ai](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102747_open%20ai.png)
![first minute](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102743_first%20minute.png)
![ycombinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110274a_ycombinator.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/66eb26eb907d3d9820d731b4_anthropic.png)
![microsoft](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102745_microsoft.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/66eb2702273f2488f5bea660_aws.png)
![open ai](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102747_open%20ai.png)
![first minute](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102743_first%20minute.png)
## How we handle claims
### Fully customisable FNOL
Get a fully bespoke FNOL, customised for your brand. Alternatively, easily integrate with your existing FNOL solution via API or SFTP
![illustration
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110274c_illustration.webp)
### Automation to accelerate claim assessments and reduce leakage
All our claims are human-validated, but we use automation to enable our handlers to make better, faster decisions
![illustration2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102751_illustration2.webp)
### Our claims team is here to support your customers
We believe that the human touch is crucial to a successful claim resolution and our team is here to support your customers every step of the way
![illustration3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110274e_illustration3.webp)
### Actionable claims data
We meticulously capture structured claims data for MGAs and insurers, making it easy to integrate it into your systems and get detailed oversight of your claims portfolio
![illustration4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110274d_illustration4.webp)
## How are we different from other TPAs
### Easy Integration
It takes less than 2 weeks to complete an integration
### 5-stars customer experience
We treat your customers like we'd treat ours, ensuring a consistently high NPS score
### Fast and accurate decisions
Using AI, we process claims with higher precision and faster turnaround.
### Reduced claim leakage
We aim to reduce your claim leakage by focusing on cost control and fraud detection
## We will help solve anyof your problems
## Insurance lines we support
### Pet
Handle pet insurance claims with care and efficiency for routine check-ups and emergencies
![pets](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102755_isolated-shot-ginger-cat-looking-retriever-dog-looking-camera-white-surface%201.webp)
### Warranty
Efficiently manage warranty claims for appliances and electronics with quick resolutions
![fridge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102752_pngegg%20\(13\)%201.webp)
### Gadget
Streamline gadget claims for damage, theft, and accidents with our expert team
![devices](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102754_modern-stationary-collection-arrangement%201.webp)
### Travel
Comprehensive travel claims management for medical emergencies, cancellations and other core travel coverages
![plane](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102753_airplane-flying-cloudy-sky%201.webp)
### IPMI
Efficiently manage international medical insurance claims for comprehensive healthcare coverage.
![insurance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/66674e61ed496e0e6e9cb940_insurance%20no%20bg.png)
### Home
Promptly handle home insurance claims for natural disasters, theft, and other damages
![home](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102757_modern-residential-district-with-green-roof-balcony-generated-by-ai%201.webp)
### Auto
Swiftly process auto insurance claims for accidents, theft, and vehicle damages
![car](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f43861102756_white-offroader-jeep-parking%201.webp)
## Global presence, local touch
### USA
![USA](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110275c_Group%207.svg)
### UnitedKingdom
![GB](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110275b_GB.svg)
### Europe
![Europe](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666725ccaf80f4386110272b/666725ccaf80f4386110275d_map.svg)
## Who we work with
### Carriers
### MGAs
### Captives
## We take security seriously
### Comprehensive security standards
### Regular security and data audits
### Complete data segregation with on-prem and cloud storage
"With ClaimSorted’s exceptional indemnity management, we’ve seen a noticeable decrease in claim payouts. Their meticulous attention to detail is impressive."
Claims Director, UK
“ClaimSorted made the integration process incredibly easy. Their team guided us every step of the way, ensuring a smooth transition.”
Operations Director, Germany

generated_description:
### ClaimSorted: Simplifying Insurance Claims with Innovation

Founded in 2024, **ClaimSorted** is a forward-thinking company revolutionizing the insurance claims process. As a part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, it emerged with a clear mission: to make it easier for insurance companies to manage claims more efficiently and effectively. 

#### What is ClaimSorted?

ClaimSorted operates as a modern **Third Party Administrator (TPA)** but distinguishes itself from traditional TPAs by integrating advanced AI technology with human expertise. This duo not only enhances the customer experience but also reduces human error and speeds up the claim assessment process. Their approach ensures that policyholders receive a stellar, five-star experience while also helping insurance carriers cut down on operational costs and indemnity payouts.

#### Key Offerings

ClaimSorted provides a suite of services designed for a wide range of insurance lines. They manage claims for:
- **Pet insurance**: Efficient handling of routine and emergency claims.
- **Warranty claims**: Swift resolutions for appliances and electronics.
- **Gadget insurance**: Expert support for theft, damage, and accident claims.
- **Travel insurance**: Comprehensive management for medical emergencies and cancellations.
- **International medical insurance**: Streamlined processes for extensive healthcare.
- **Home and Auto insurance**: Quick claims processing for property and vehicle-related incidents.

#### Why Choose ClaimSorted?

1. **Easy Integration**: They boast a rapid integration timeline—less than two weeks—making onboarding seamless for new clients.
2. **Exceptional Customer Experience**: A commitment to treating customers with care results in high customer satisfaction scores (NPS).
3. **AI-driven Efficiency**: Using innovative automation, claims are processed more quickly and accurately while minimizing potential fraud and claim leakage.
4. **Human Touch**: Despite their tech-forward approach, ClaimSorted emphasizes the importance of human interaction in claim resolution, ensuring that clients feel supported throughout the process.

#### Team and Leadership

Located in New York with a team of about 20 dedicated professionals, ClaimSorted is led by **Tom Blomfield**, a notable figure in the tech and finance sectors. Under his guidance, the company is positioned not just to innovate but also to ensure that innovations directly benefit the users in the insurance ecosystem.

#### Conclusion

ClaimSorted is not just another claims processor. They're building a bridge between cutting-edge technology and customer-centric service, helping insurance companies navigate the often cumbersome claims process with ease. For those in the insurance sector looking to enhance their claims experience while maintaining efficiency, ClaimSorted is a promising partner. 

For more information or to see it in action, visit [ClaimSorted’s website](https://claimsorted.com) or request a demo.
